description:
Lin`s friend, Airi, is being stalked. The three brothers immediately come to her aid, saying they`ll take care of the stalker. They sneakily follow Airi around and soon find out it`s not just a stalker that follows Airi around...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dastardly! Hell is Too Kind for Stalkers! \ There are no Bananas! Kenshiro`s First Shopping Trip
Hiretsu! Stalker ni wa Jigoku Suru Namanurui! Banana ga Nai! Kenshirou Hajimete no Otsukai
卑劣! ストーカーには地獄すら生ぬるい! / バナナがない! ケンシロウはじめてのおつかい
